description: Reference® 2 is a premium pipette with extraordinary precision and accuracy. Besides improved ergonomics the design focus lays on providing the most accurate results possible, optimum user safety, reliability and robustness for a long service life. The innovative single button operation is not only fast and simple, but also can effectively reduce aerosols, thus protecting users, samples and pipettes. The rugged handle is made of stainless steel to protect the pipette from impact and is used in combination with a spring-loaded buffer, reference 2 may remain within the calibrated range even if dropped. These high levels of safety make Reference 2 ideal for use with precious liquids or in any application requiring extremely high accuracy.
name: Reference 2 Liquid Handling Starter 1 package
